Damit Sie als Endbenutzer Ihr auf Sie zu: In order for you, the end user, to be able to use your customized product appropriately, you do not have to hesitate if there are any questions or problems and you can contact us at any time.
Das ermöglicht unser Tool: This is what our tool enables
Die Aufgabe der Absatzplanung ist es, fe: The task of sales planning is to determine how many final products are to be distributed in the coming period.
Die Datei muss das XML-Format haben. Nac: The file has to be in the xml format. After the upload you will be redirected automatically to the next step.
Dieses Team steht Ihnen zur Seite: This team is at your service
Ihre für Sie zugeschnittene XML-Datei st: Your customized XML file is ready to download
Im Rahmen der Programmplanung wird auf B: During program planning, the quantity of parts to be produced is determined based on the sales request and inventory levels.
In diesem Schritt wird der sogenannte Ka: In this step, the so-called capacity plan is drawn up on the basis of the sales request in connection with the setup times, setup steps, overtime, additional shifts, etc.
Innerhalb der Mengenplanung gilt es, das: Within the quantity planning it is necessary to deal with the topic of orders and to clarify which parts have to be ordered with which shipping method.
Klicken Sie den folgenden Button und sta: Click the following button and start now directly the optimized production planning specific for your own bike store.
Laden Sie die XML-Datei der vergangenen: Load the XML file of the previous period into the tool to be able to start the analysis and planning.
Nachdem die Berechnungen abgeschlossen s: After the calculations are complete, you can download the optimized overall result in the form of an XML file based on your entered data.
Bitte laden Sie Ihr Periodenergebnis hoc: Please upload the last period result.
Unser Team aus Experten verschiedenster: Our team of experts from a wide range of technologies and disciplines is available to you around the clock. We welcome feedback on existing features of our product and want to continuously improve it together with you.
Unsere Mission ist es, glückliche Kunden: Our mission is to represent happy customers. Therefore, it is important for us to continuously solicit criticism and suggestions for improvement from our end users. For this reason, we would appreciate a review!
Über eine Bewertung würden wir uns freue: We would be pleased about a rating
